description: A symmetrical triangle of polynomial coefficients that are von Koch like: b=1/4; p(x, n) = If[Mod[n, 4] == 2, (b*x - n/2)*p(x, n - 1), If[ Mod[n, 4] == 3, (x/2 - b*n + 1/2)*p(x, n - 1), If[ Mod[n, 4] == 0, (-b*x - n/2 + b)*p(x, n - 1), (x/2 + b*n)*p(x, n - 1)]]]; q(x,n)=(p(x,n)+x^n*(p(1/x,n))/b^n.
